english: excuse me sir when does the next train to torino leave
italian: mi scusi signore quando parte il prossimo treno per torino

english: the train leaves in ten minutes
italian: il treno parte fra dieci minuti

english: it leaves at ten o'clock in the morning
how much does a ticket cost
he wants a ticket for the train that leaves for Naples at 10 o'clock in the morning
italian: lui vuole un biglietto per il treno che parte per Napoli alle dieci del mattino

english: excuse me sir where is the bus to the beach?
italian: mi scusi signore dov'è l'autobus per la spiaggia?

english: it's over there on the left
which one? There are many of them
does this bus go to the beach?
no, the number five goes to the beach
italian: no, il numero cinque va alla spiaggia

english: at what time does the last bus for the beach leave
italian: a che ora parte l'ultimo autobus per la spiaggia

english: the last bus leaves at seventeen twenty
italian: l'ultimo autobus parte alle diciassette e venti
